title: Niwa ni wa Ninin
sinopse:
A collection of surreal one-shots themed around gardens.

1. Niwashi no Shigoto (The Work of a Gardener)
2. Suisou Yashiki (Mansion Aquarium)
3. Eureka no Niwa (Eureka Garden)
4. Watashi no Oniwa (The Garden of Me)
   5-6. Niwa ni wa Ninin (Two Guys in a Garden)
5. Niwashi no Kyuujitsu (A Gardener’s Day Off)
